term: What was the problem with the Embargo Act?
content:
shooting yourself in the foot
cripples NE economy
americans were adaptable - they began smuggling goods up into canada for trading
	this summer only, ships leaving from, eg charleston (south), trying to go somewhere north, eg boston, get caught in winds and pull them across the ocean into liverpool and paris
the point is: americans got pretty good at getting around this embargo act
it was an enormous failure - it was very difficult to enforce
	it was so bad that jefferson was going to push to repeal it in his last days in office
